body:
Syntax: backstab <target>

Backstab allows a rogue to strike at an unaware opponent's vital points
with a piercing weapon, potentially dealing massive damage. This skill
requires stealth and precision timing.

Classes: Thief, Assassin
Skill Type: Combat
Weapon Required: Piercing (dagger, stiletto, etc.)

To successfully backstab, you must be wielding a piercing weapon and your
target must not be fighting you. The damage multiplier increases as your
skill improves. Failed attempts will initiate combat normally.

See Also: SNEAK, HIDE
